div.head: 浸淫惡瘡
div.div: malign sores soaked [with pus and/or liquid]

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: malign sores soaked [with pus and/or liquid]

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with jin yin chuang 浸淫瘡 , sores soaked [with pus and/or liquid]. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 19: 胡麻生嚼塗小兒頭瘡及浸淫惡瘡，大效 , “Fresh hu ma is to be chewed to be externally applied to head sores and malign sores soaked [with pus and/or liquid] in children”. Jin yu 金郁 , pent-up metal [qi] [3]
Pathological Condition of lung qi accumulation forming nodes and failing to move. Su wen 素問 71: 金郁泄 之 , “In the case of pent-up metal [qi] , drain it”.
